channel.title: Getting a monster to do 2 attacks, both of them random
channel.description: Title says it all except I'll explain the both of them random part. What I mean is, whenever the monster attacks, it is random on which attack the monster will do next. Like flipping a coin, head heads tails heads etc. If no one knows this, I would like to know how to make a monster do 2 attacks normally. I am trying to get the ket-Zek to do his mage and melee attack. I have the melee attack but the other attack isn't working.

item.title: Getting a monster to do 2 attacks, both of them random
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

Title says it all except I’ll explain the both of them random part. What I mean is, whenever the monster attacks, it is random on which attack the monster will do next. Like flipping a coin, head heads tails heads etc. If no one knows this, I would like to know how to make a monster do 2 attacks normally. I am trying to get the ket-Zek to do his mage and melee attack. I have the melee attack but the other attack isn’t working.
